text: Samuel Ward King (May 23, 1786 â€“ January 20, 1851) was an American politician and physician. He was the 15th Governor of Rhode Island from 1839 to 1843. He was a member of the Whig Party. ==References== Category:1786 births Category:1851 deaths Category:American physicians Category:Governors of Rhode Island Category:Scientists from Rhode Island Category:Whig Party (United States) politicians
